raw_response:
Unfortunately, I'm a text-based AI and cannot directly access or analyze images. However, I can guide you through the process of identifying handwritten editorial corrections and creating the JSON output.

To proceed, please provide a detailed description of the handwritten corrections in the printed text, including:

1. The original text being modified
2. The corrected text after applying the edit
3. The type of edit (insertion, deletion, replacement, punctuation, capitalization, reordering)
4. The line number where the edit occurs (line 0 is the title, line 1 is the first full line of body text)

Once I have this information, I can help you create the JSON output in the required format.

If you can provide the text with the handwritten corrections, I can assist you in identifying the corrections and creating the JSON output.
